roleset.name: provoke interest, exhibit curiosity

role.descr: interested in, interesting thing (non-agentive adj subjects, see ex)

example.name: interest-v: all args
example.text: Mr. Guber and Mr. Peters planned to run the nearly dormant MGM studio , and the two even tried to interest Warner Bros. ' President Terry Semel in becoming a partner after he advised them on the deal .

example.name: interest-v: arg2
example.text: Mr. Sim considers the new unit 's operations `` fundamentally sound '' and adds that Barry Wright has been fairly successful in moving into markets that have n't interested larger competitors .

example.name: interested-j: no arg2
example.text: But neither the pilots nor the machinists appear interested .

propbank.arg: neither the pilots nor the machinists

example.name: interested-j: with arg2
example.text: Jaguar assumed its recently customary place on the OTC most active list as its American depository receipts gained 1/4 to 11 7/8 on volume of 1.2 million shares and Daimler - Benz joined the list of companies interested in the British car maker .

example.name: have_interest-l: Args 1 & 2
example.text: It is for those who have no interest in spiritual things and for those who kill their fathers or mothers or anyone else .

example.name: interest-n: arg1
example.text: Pakistan was founded on the basis that Muslims felt their interests would not be guarded by a Hindu government , not as some spiritual Muslim homeland .

example.name: interest-n
example.text: -LRB- eg they have been kidnapped , and police seek public help to find them - or they have been murdered - or if they are alleged to have committed a very serious crime and are being tried as adults , or if it is in some way in the public interest . -RRB-

example.name: interested-j: both args
example.text: Seems Froch may be interested in taking on the winner , although personally I think he 'd have way too much for either of them at this stage of their careers .

example.name: interesting-j: empty it, arg2
example.text: It will be interesting to watch who takes what sides .

propbank.arg: to watch who takes what sides

example.name: interesting-n: concatenated arg0
example.text: While he did n't provide much to each scene , he was interesting to watch , obviously caring more about the overall performance than Brynner did .

propbank.arg: While he did n't provide much to each scene
obviously caring more about the overall performance than Brynner did

roleset.note: INTEREST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'interest' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class amuse-31.1. Comparison with 'surprise'. (from interest.01-v)
INTEREST-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry interest.01. Corresponds to Verbnet class 31.1. (from interest.01-n)
INTERESTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, interest-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from interested.01-j)
INTERESTING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, interest-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1. (from interesting.01-j)
